miseEnPlace.description: Place eggs in a steamer and steam for 10-11 minutes

method.text: De-shell steamed eggs, cut the white white part way so you can open it with your hands and remove the yolk into a separate bowl from the whites.
add mayonnaise to the yolks and mash it up into a smooth paste
roughly chop the whites into small pieces (this is the texture so as small/big as you want)
fold yolks paste with chopped whites

notes: Cut sandwiches in half (or quarters for kids)
